name: Reflector
description:
Reflector is an action packed FPS game. It features a different type of gameplay where you don't have a gun. You can reflect projectiles or absorb them and shoot them back at enemies. 

This prototype is a game developed for the Mirror Game Jam. I worked on this around 6  days.  All of the programming/art is original and created by me. All of the music was created by XIFI and all of the sound effects are public domain. I hope you enjoy the game! 

Instructions:
Controls are taught in game but for those interested. 
-Space to jump, press twice to double jump 
-W,A,S,D To move
-Shift to Dash
-Left click and Right Click for abilities
